text: D. E. Shaw & Co., L.P. is a multinational investment management firm founded in 1988 by David E. Shaw and based in New York City. The company is known for developing complicated mathematical models and sophisticated computer programs to exploit anomalies in financial markets. In 2023, Forbes reported that among hedge funds, D. E. Shaw had delivered the third-highest returns in the world since it started. ==References== Category:1988 establishments Category:Companies based in New York City
title: D. E. Shaw & Co.
